headline: Show HN: Prodscape.net – Map your mobile app
description:
Link: https://prodscape.net

-----

Hello HN,

Long-time lurker, first-time poster. I've created a service that creates a "flow map" of your mobile app.

The goal is to reduce last-minute regressions, promote holistic discussion, and help develop more ownership within an organization. This is something that I would have liked to have had when I was working at a big company.

Some caveats:

  * Only iOS is currently supported but Android-support will be coming soon.
  * You need a developer-signed IPA file (see the guide on creating an IPA file here: https://prodscape.net/finding-ipa.html).
I would appreciate your thoughts on:

  1.) your barriers to trying it
  2.) your impressions of the map
  3.) whether you're interested in applying this within your team
  4.) anything else.
Don't have access to an IPA file? Email me at illahi@prodscape.net and I will send you one to try.

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Prodscape.net - 绘制您的移动应用地图
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Prodscape.net - 繪製您的移動應用地圖
description_zh-Hans:
链接：https://prodscape.net

-----

Hello HN,

长期的潜伏者，第一次发帖。我创建了一项服务，可以为你的移动应用创建一个"流程图"。

目标是减少最后一刻的倒退，促进整体讨论，并帮助在一个组织内发展更多的所有权。这是我在大公司工作时希望拥有的东西。

一些注意事项：

 * 目前只支持iOS，但Android的支持即将到来。
  * You need a developer-signed IPA file (see the guide on creating an IPA file here: https://prodscape.net/finding-ipa.html).
I would appreciate your thoughts on:

 1.) your barriers to trying it
  2.) 你对该地图的印象
  3.) whether you're interested in applying this within your team
  4.) anything else.
没有访问IPA文件的权限？给我发电子邮件：illahi@prodscape.net，我将给你发送一个试试。

谢谢！
description_zh-Hant:
鏈接：https://prodscape.net

-----

Hello HN,

長期的潛伏者，第一次發帖。我創建了一項服務，可以為你的移動應用創建一個"流程圖"。

目標是減少最後一刻的倒退，促進整體討論，並幫助在一個組織內發展更多的所有權。這是我在大公司工作時希望擁有的東西。

一些注意事項：

 * 目前只支持iOS，但Android的支持即將到來。
  * You need a developer-signed IPA file (see the guide on creating an IPA file here: https://prodscape.net/finding-ipa.html).
I would appreciate your thoughts on:

 1.) your barriers to trying it
  2.) 你對該地圖的印象
  3.) whether you're interested in applying this within your team
  4.) anything else.
沒有訪問IPA文件的權限？給我發電子郵件：illahi@prodscape.net，我將給你發送一個試試。

謝謝！
